item.title: My Intro
item.author: Admin
item.description:
I don't know why I am writing this but I wanted to add a meaningful blog post here. I am an ordinary person and make blog post and software as a hobby you know ðŸ˜…. I used to work with the moderators and developers of Rapid, you know, because I am a moderator. I have created 2 accounts on this page currently. Admin and System_Default. Admin is my account but System_default is just a disguise of Admin. We use the latter account sometimes to make the workflow proper to understand, so whatever is done by this account, it's automatic!
See you next time!
